Title: C# Based Open Source SNMP Library for .NET and Mono
Description: #SNMP Library is a free and open source SNMP class library for developers who target Microsoft .NET/Xamarin Mono platforms. It's developed in C#.
HomeWiki:
Produced and supported by LeXtudio.

Project Description

#SNMP Library is a free and open source SNMP class library for developers who target Microsoft .NET/Xamarin Mono platforms. It's developed in C#.

(C) 2008-2016 Malcolm Crowe, Lex Li, and other contributors.

News

  • Jan 16, 2017 #SNMP Pro Edition 1.2 is published.
  • Nov 20, 2016 LordGate (9.0.8) is published at NuGet.org.
  • Jan 27, 2016 New documentation site is online.
  • Feb 22, 2015 #SNMP Pro Edition 1.1 is published.
  • Feb 22, 2015 TritonMate Refresh (8.5) is published at NuGet.org.
  • Feb 18, 2015 Full OS X support is announced.
  • Feb 6, 2014 LeXtudio homepage is now officially launched.
  • Feb 3, 2014 Pro Edition homepage is now officially launched.
  • Feb 1, 2014 Discussion board is going to be shut down. Please post questions to StackOverflow.

Features

  • Target both Microsoft .NET and Xamarin Mono (including Xamarin.iOS and Xamarin.Android).
  • Fully open source at GitHub.
  • Tested currently on Windows ,
OS X, Ubuntu , and openSUSE .
  • Encapsulate SNMP functions in a natural and easy-to-use API set.
  • Release under MIT/X11. (MIB related portion is released under BSD 3 Clause.)
  • Support .NET Framework 4.5.2 and above, Mono 4.2 and above, Xamarin.iOS Unified, and Xamarin.Android.

Support for .NET Framework 2.0 and 3.0 expired on April 12, 2011. #SNMP release BigDipper (7.0) and above no longer supports these two obsolete .NET versions.

Support for .NET Framework 4.0, 4.5, and 4.5.1 expired on Jan 12, 2016. #SNMP release LordGate (9.0.8) and above will no longer support these obsolete .NET versions.

Pro Editions

#SNMP MIB Compiler Pro and Browser Pro are enterprise specific editions of SNMP utilities that build upon #SNMP Library.
